name: Jagdev Singh Dosanjh
text:
🌀 Quantum Riddle: The Whispering Door

I am a door that opens both ways, Yet no one sees me move. I split the world with silent plays, And leave behind no groove. I’m neither here nor fully gone— Until you choose to look. What am I, in quantum dawn, That rewrites every book?

Answer: The quantum superposition—where particles exist in multiple states until observed.
